title: Kjeldoran Knight
text: Banding (Any creatures with banding, and up to one without, can attack in a band. Bands are blocked as a group. If any creatures with banding you control are blocking or being blocked by a creature, you divide that creature's combat damage, not its controller, among any of the creatures it's being blocked by or is blocking.): Kjeldoran Knight gets +1/+0 until end of turn.: Kjeldoran Knight gets +0/+2 until end of turn.
